name: James SAMPLE, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY CLERK OF the COURT (CRIMINAL DIV.) and Common Pleas Court of Philadelphia Judge Honorable Peter F. Rogers, Respondents

parties: James SAMPLE, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY CLERK OF the COURT (CRIMINAL DIV.) and Common Pleas Court of Philadelphia Judge Honorable Peter F. Rogers, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of September, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is DIRECTED to adjudicate Petitioner’s petition within 90 days of this order. The Prothonotary shall STRIKE the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
100 A.3d 570
James SAMPLE, Petitioner v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY CLERK OF the COURT (CRIMINAL DIV.) and Common Pleas Court of Philadelphia Judge Honorable Peter F. Rogers, Respondents.
No. 104 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 16, 2014.
